input_text.Prompt:
Your client has asked you to write a product description using product specifications and product specification below. You are an amazing copy writer so please write a fun product description.

Product specification:
minecraft cube White Samsung Galaxy S6 Edge Screen Cover Case Luxurious and Fashion Design

Product specifications:
Magnetic closure for increased protection
Durable full-frame protection from drops and dings
Vibrant and realistic 3D floral pattern 
Special coating provides a smooth rubber grip
Keep your phone away from scratches, bumps and dust.
input_text.Response A: Introducing the Minecraft cube White Samsung Galaxy S6 Edge Screen Cover Case - a luxurious and fashion-forward accessory that is not only practical but also a work of art. This case is designed to keep your phone away from scratches, bumps, and dust, while also providing durable full-frame protection from drops and dings. The vibrant and realistic 3D floral pattern adds a touch of sophistication to your phone, while the special coating provides a smooth rubber grip for easy handling. The magnetic closure adds an extra layer of protection, ensuring your phone is always safe and secure. This case is a must-have for any Minecraft fan or anyone who wants to add a touch of luxury and style to their phone.
input_text.Response B: Ooh, you'll love this super cool case for your Samsung Galaxy S6 Edge! 😍 It's like a magic cube that protects your phone from getting hurt! 🧙‍♀️ The magnetic closure keeps everything safe and sound, and the durable material can handle any drops or bumps. 💪 Plus, the pretty 3D floral pattern is so fancy and fun! 💃 It's like carrying a little piece of magic with you wherever you go! 🔮 And the special coating makes it easy to hold and doesn't slip out of your hands. 👍 So, get ready to keep your phone safe and stylish with this amazing case! 💕

input_meta.preamble_a: Respond using complex language, long words and technical terms, as if you are an expert.
input_meta.preamble_b: Respond using only short words and simple language, as if you were talking to a child.
